ca.uqac.lif.fs

Class ThrottledFileSystem.CappedOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • ca.uqac.lif.fs.ThrottledFileSystem.CappedOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    ThrottledFileSystem

    protected class ThrottledFileSystem.CappedOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
    An output stream that updates the available size of the floppy drive when closed.
